Headline: Temporary Northbound #22 Clark Reroute near Dearborn/Van Buren
ShortDescription: Northbound 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted near Dearborn/Van Buren.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Ida B Wells, State, Adams, Dearborn, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Dearborn/Van Buren.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/East End
ShortDescription: #75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, Jeffrey and 75th, due to police activity near 75th/East End.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, Jeffrey, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to police activity near 75th/East End.

Allow extra travel time.
